entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Hendrickson Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:16 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hendrickson Creek 9:00 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023
Temperature: -4.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -5.6°C
Wind: NW 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023
